author: Charles H Baker
description: If using a sweeter Madeira such as Verdelho/Rainwater (medium dry) or Bual (medium sweet) you'll need to adjust this finely balanced cocktail. Even Baker himself says it "needs a little trimming". However, dry Sercial Madeira works best to produce a finely balanced complex cocktail.
name: Creole Contentment

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
